snippet: The presumption that Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel will win another term has led many of his supporters to flirt with smaller parties that cater to special interests.
abstract: Memo From Tel Aviv; presumption that Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu will win another term has led many of his traditional supporters to flirt with smaller parties that cater to special interests; danger posed by his presumed front-runner status is that Netanyahu may end up with relatively slim majority in Parliament.
lead_paragraph: The presumption that Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel will win another term has led many of his supporters to flirt with smaller parties that cater to special interests.

headline.seo: For Netanyahu in Israel, Being in Front Has Risks
headline.main: For Netanyahu, Being Favored to Win Carries Its Own Risks
headline.print_headline: For Netanyahu, Being Favored to Win Carries Its Own Risks
